alert.note: Alert for East Sweetwater County; Flaming Gorge; Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Rock Springs and Green River (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 09 at 6:36AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...Strong Winds Through this Afternoon... This is a special weather statement from the National Weather Service in Riverton. * WHAT...South to southwest wind between 25 and 35 mph with gusts 40 to 50 mph. Wind gusts of 60 to 65 mph have already occurred at the Rock Springs Airport since 330 AM. * WHERE...Sweetwater County into Southeast Fremont County and southwest Natrona County. * WHEN...Today. The strongest winds are likely through 2 PM. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Mainly to transportation, especially on west to east orientated roads. Control issues are likely, especially for lightweight and high-profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers.

area.areaDesc: East Sweetwater County; Flaming Gorge; Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Rock Springs and Green River
